topic: Credit hurdles in the Bachelor of Computer Science
question: Hello, I have a question regarding the credit hurdles in the Bachelor of Computer Science. I am currently in my 3rd semester and am unsure whether an application for recognition of academic achievements will be accepted, which could lead to a conflict with the credit hurdles. Could I de-register after the enrollment period without fear of failing, or even de-register in March if I don't have enough credits? Thank you very much for your help."
answer: Hello, if this winter semester is your 3rd semester, you still have time to get the required credits. How many credits do you currently have and how many responses are you still waiting for regarding recognition?
